rules_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. Overclock deals X damage to you, where X is the number of spells you've cast this turn.
flavor_text:
[i]“Integrating magitech into your body opens the door to numerous fatal errors, but the power briefly granted is . . . breathtaking.”
—Azamir, “The Artificer's Finale”[/i]
notes: fluffy: -dashgap, separated ellipses, -extra ellipses dot, period>comma, +commma after you in rulestext
